issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Right now if the long-running initial APK deploy to the emulator fails for some reason, we need to make sure that all the files are still copied to the /sdcard on the subsequent Launch.

See related Q&A:
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/13341/unsuccessful-runni...

{html}
fields.summary: Check that files are copied to /sdcard in builder.py

comments.body:
{html}

(from [372950c0c79bb3517783b17b135dde774b2173dd]) added a check for sdcard resources, this ensures a full copy happens if something went bad on the last deploy [#747 state:resolved] http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/372950c0c79bb...

{html}
